Record.ParentTerm: Abnormal Blood Chemistry and Hematology Test Result
Record.ClassificationPath: Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Finding/Test Result/Laboratory Finding/Abnormal Laboratory Test Result/Abnormal Blood Chemistry and Hematology Test Result/Vitamin B Deficiency
Nutritional and Metabolic Diseases/Nutrition Disorders/Malnutrition/Deficiency Diseases/Avitaminosis/Vitamin B Deficiency
Record.BroaderTerm: Abnormal Blood Chemistry and Hematology Test Result
Record.Description: A condition due to deficiency in any member of the VITAMIN B COMPLEX. These B vitamins are water-soluble and must be obtained from the diet because they are easily lost in the urine. Unlike the lipid-soluble vitamins, they cannot be stored in the body fat.
